title: The Escape
description: In The Alternate Universe (Part 1 of Khronos Chronicles), Claude and his best friend Carolien race to find his father’s time machine before it falls into the hands of the largest corporation in the world. In Part 2, the time machine whisks them to the plantation where Carolien’s ancestors were slaves and where their actions will either give a ruthless corporation absolute control over time or will bring their families—and the world—back together.
author: Rob Wolf
